embeds.description:
- No racism, bullying, discrimination or anything of the matter.
- No advertisement in any form without proper permissions.
- Do not promote or condone in unsportsmanlike behavior.
- No NSFW or content that can be deemed as disturbing.
- No flirting, dating, sexual or any +18 conversations.
- No excessive pinging, spamming or anything similar.
- No controversial or sensitive topics allowed. 
- Exclusively use English.

**These rules extend from K-ON!, since this is a directly affiliated server. For an extended version of the rules, please** [click here.](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WX5p0lpnGK-jpWl10W7ejKI-EjN6h475mHdL6R5AHys/)

:pushpin: **Follow the Discord ToS & Community Guidelines:**
https://discord.com/guidelines
https://discord.com/terms

**Chess Administrators:** <@&914840474966188042>
> Server Administrators; should be the first person you approach in case of an emergency or anything similar.

**Chess Supervisors:** <@&914840623390003200>
> Are responsible for overseeing tournaments. In case of any questions or rulings, please refer to them.

**Tournament Organisers:** <@&914841064710483998>
> The current host of the tournament. If you are interested in hosting your own K-ON! Chess tournament, please message Kurylo#0625 or any Chess Administrator.

**K-ON! Staff:** <@&914840926470406164>
> Staff members from K-ON!. They have high permissions and are able to enforce rulings in this server as well. All negative actions here, can carry over to the main server.

**Enjoy your time here at the K-ON Community Discord Server!**

Please read everything above and make sure you are familiar with everything regarding our server! If you have any queries at all, feel free to ask a member of staff - either in chat, or in DMs!

**Vanity URL:** http://discord.gg/kon
**Permanent Link:** http://discord.gg/NsJ6S3W
**Server Wiki:** http://koncord.fandom.com/

**K-ON! Chess:** https://discord.gg/dqS7ZUkpEQ
**K-ON Subreddit:** https://www.reddit.com/r/k_on/
**K-ON Wiki:** http://k-on.fandom.com/
